description: Episode of Series "Health and Safety for You" Talks about health in reference to our daily lives, eg water, and how we have to be careful and make sure water that reaches the community is clean and safe to consume. Also goes into general cleanliness in relation to sewerage and garbage to prevent disease entering our lives.
